column1: '''To the Sea, to the Sea! The white gulls are crying''' is a poem sung by [[Legolas]] in "[[The Field of Cormallen]]".

column2: to the Sea! The white gulls are crying
and the white foam is flying.

column1: The voices of my people that have gone before me?

column2: I will leave the woods that bore me;

column1: For our days are ending and our years failing.
I will pass the wide waters lonely sailing.
Long are the waves on the [[Valinor|Last Shore]] falling
Sweet are the voices in the [[Tol Eressëa|Lost Isle]] calling

column2: in [[Eldamar|Elvenhome]] that no man can discover

column1: Where the leaves fall not: land of my people for ever!
* [[Poems in The Lord of the Rings]]
